extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
    Activity to handle all interactions on the Event Details page

      Calls the post method of userEvents to create a relationship between user and event

      Enable EditText field

      Calls the get endpoint of users to associate a user with the current session REMOVE LATER - once Session Users enabled

      Calls get method of userEvents endpoint to get the data for the user/event relationship for the current page

      Initialize all the global variable values

      Shows the registrant activity screen on click of the View Participant button

      Sets up the event details page either with the data of an event or empty text fields to create an event Also handles what buttons appear depending on isAdmin, isCheckedIn
